body_html: Looking again, I think you're right that it would be good if this were flagged up. However this function is a very hot code path that has been worked over carefully in the past for optimization so I'm not completely comfortable just suggesting you send a PR to fix this (e.g., make the call return an error rather than CHECK). @asimshankar would you take a look and see if you're happy with the performance implications of this check?

body: Looking again, I think you're right that it would be good if this were flagged up. However this function is a very hot code path that has been worked over carefully in the past for optimization so I'm not completely comfortable just suggesting you send a PR to fix this (e.g., make the call return an error rather than CHECK). @asimshankar would you take a look and see if you're happy with the performance implications of this check?
